resources.string:
Acrylic Paint is a coloring tool which helps you to make anything of your imagination.
Pick the color you want and start painting.

Press menu for more options!

Happy painting :)

This software is released under the terms of the GNU General Public License Version 3+.
Thanks to Anupam Shrivastava for the idea, to Valerio Bozzolan for reviving the project and the physicist Marco Gagino for the strong support. Thanks to all the contributors!
Here is your canvas. Start to paint!
Look at what I painted with Acrylic Paint! --- Acrylic Paint (Simple finger painting) - https://f-droid.org/app/anupam.acrylic
Can\'t locate an app to share with…

Acrylic Paint

Thanks for using Acrylic Paint!
A Free and Open Source software… to free your creativity!
